column2: "Ɔbɔbɔfo a ɔnam nokwardzi mu no
column3: oye Sen nyia ndabraba ahyɛ n'anomu ma na ɔyɛ ɔkwasea."

column2: "Eso
column4: onnye: Na nyia ne nan ho yɛ har no

column2: "Nyimpa ne nkwaseadze dze no fa ɔsɛɛ kwan do: Na n'akoma sorow EWURADZE do."
"Ahonya dɔr anyɛnkofo pii: Na ohianyi dze
"Ɔdasetorfo nnkɛfa noho edzi; Na nyia ɔka atorsɛm no onnkefi nsa."
"Dodowara bɛdzɛfɛdzɛfɛw ɔyamuyiefo: Na obiara fa nyia ɔkyekyɛ adze no nyɛnko."
"Hianyi dze
column3: no nuanom nyinara mpo kyir no: Na akantam dɛ n'anyɛnkofo bɛbɛn no. Ɔka kasa pa dɛn ara mpo a

column2: "Nyia ɔnya nyansa no
column3: ɔdɔ nankasa ne kra: Nyia ɔdze ntseasee sie no

column2: "Ɔdasetorfo nnkɛfa noho edzi: Na nyia ɔka atorsɛm no
"Asetsena fɔntɔmm mmfata ɔkwasea; Na akantam dɛ akowaa bedzi ahenmba do."
"Nyimpa nyansanyi fa ebufuw nyaa: Na ɔyɛ enyimnyam ma no dɛ ɔdze mfom bɛkyɛ."
"Ɔhen n'ebufuw tse dɛ awendadze a ɔropɔw; Na n'enyimpa tse dɛ nkyɛkyɛr do ɔbɔnsu."
"Ɔba kwasea yɛ n'egya n'amandzehu: Na ɔyer n'enhwinhwin tse dɛ daa nsu nsosɔwee."
"Ɔdan na ahonya yɛ ewungyadze a ofir egyanom: Na ɔyer ɔbadwembanyi dze
"Enyiahaw ma nda heii: Na ɔkra kwadwefo bedzi kɔm."
"Nyia osie mbrasɛm no
column3: osie ne kra: Na nyia obu n'enyi gu n'akwan do no

column2: "Nyia ohu ohianyi mbɔbɔr no
"Enyidado wɔ hɔ yi
column3: tsea wo ba; Mbom mma mmfa w'akoma nnsi ne sɛɛe do."

column2: "Nyia n'ebufuw so no
column3: ma onya ho ntsea: Osiandɛ sɛ egye no kor a

column2: "Tsie afotu
column4: Ama aayɛ onyansafo wɔ w'ewiei ekyir no mu."

column2: "Nhyehyɛɛ pii wɔ nyimpa n'akoma mu
column3: Naaso EWURADZE nhyehyɛɛ no na obegyina."

column2: "Nyimpa ho akɔndɔ gyina n'ayamuyie dodow do: Na ohianyi ye sen ɔkɔhwinyi."
"EWURADZE ho suro dzi kɔ nkwa mu: Na nyia ɔwɔ no no
column3: ɔbɛtsena hɔ dɛ ɔamee; Wɔnnkɛfa mbusu aba no do."

column2: "Ɔkwadwefo dze ne nsa nu nkwansɛn mu
column3: Na ɔnnkɛfa asan akɔ n'anomu mpo bio."

column2: "Bɔ ɔtwetwesifo
column3: na ɔbatam bosua enyitsew: Na ka nyia ɔwɔ ntseasee enyim

column2: "Nyia ɔbɔ n'egya etsirmɔdzen na ɔpam ne na no
column3: Ɔyɛ ɔba a ɔhyɛ enyito na ɔdze enyimguase ba."

column2: "Me ba
"Ɔdasefo huhuw si atsɛmbu atwetwe: Na emumuyɛfo ano memen mbusu."
"Woesiesie atsɛmbu ama atwetwesifo
column3: Na mbaahwe ama nkwasea hɔn ekyir."
